body:
Comment 1 by **gorgonzola@online.de**: 
i found a very good example for why there should be general agreements. i wanted to
translate some gettext .po files to json and found lots of the following in the
documentation to the po file format:

perl-brace-format
no-perl-brace-format
    Likewise for Perl brace, see perl-format.
php-format
no-php-format
    Likewise for PHP, see php-format.
gcc-internal-format
no-gcc-internal-format
    Likewise for the GCC sources, see gcc-internal-format.
qt-format
no-qt-format
    Likewise for Qt, see qt-format.
kde-format
no-kde-format
    Likewise for KDE, see kde-format.
boost-format
no-boost-format
    Likewise for Boost, see boost-format. 

we shouldn't end in this mess too!

gorgonzola
